# Data Processing
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
geno_test <- read_tsv(https://github.com/dah96/bcb546/raw/master/R_Assignment/fang_et_al_genotypes.txt)
genotypes <- read_tsv("fang_et_al_genotypes.txt")
snp_positions <- read_tsv("snp_position.txt")
```
Loaded the tidyverse package and loaded the two data files as dataframes in R.
```{r}
nrow(genotypes)
ncol(genotypes)
object.size(genotypes)
```
fang_et_al_genotypes.txt has 2782 rows, 986 columns, and is 23.1Mb in size.
```{r}
nrow(snp_positions)
ncol(snp_positions)
object.size(snp_positions)
```
snp_position.txt is 983 rows, 15 columns, and is 359kb is size.
```{r}
t_genotypes <- t(genotypes)
```
